Eventlet.text: ALASKA: Solomon! This is Alaska, do you copy?
SOLOMON: Ferrari! It's about damn time...
ALASKA: How many times have told you, call me ALASKA!
SOLOMON: A thousand pardons, Ferrari. What's the mission again?
ALASKA: Ugh, whatever. OK, Solomon, your mission this time is to grab up all the change in the famous Trevi Fountain.
SOLOMON: Don't you know? It means, 'This will be easy.'
ALASKA: I think you mean, 'Piece of Cake.'
SOLOMON: That doesn't even make sense. Cake can be quite hard.
ALASKA: Whatever! OK, just go get those coins, and don't get caught by any of the guards this time Solomon!
SOLOMON: Got it! Piece of Salmon!
